question: Was out of control diabetic for several years. Diabetes resolved x 1.5 yr post roux n y gastric bypass.  Rt eye vision pulsation post valsalva x 6 yr-upper/mid eye. now lower lt eye milder vision pulsation lower infer. chunk of vitrous fluid broke off and is slowly resolving x 3 mo.  Eye exams cannot see anything wrong, but I am concerned about losing my eye sight. these pulsations worry me that there may be small aneurysm?? what can I do?
title: VISION PULSATIONS WITH VALSALVA
